description.description-title: Send tokens to multiple accounts at once
description.description-text: With The MetaSender you can send tokens to multiple accounts at the same time on networks like Ethereum, Binance, Polygon, among others. At a reduced price.
description.description-action: Connect your Wallet choose a network and select one way to do it:
description.description-send-file: Send tokens by adding accounts from an Excel file.
description.description-send-manual: Send tokens by adding accounts manually.

send-process.send-process-drop-title: Drag and drop the file here
send-process.send-process-template-text: *The file must comply with the template:
send-process.send-process-template-condition1: *Each data in the file must not contain blank spaces
send-process.send-process-template-condition2: *If you are going to send ERC721, in the amount column you must indicate the ID of the token to send
send-process.send-process-file-label-tokenType: Select the Type of Token to Send
